channel.title: Question to anyone with knowledge to clients && servers
channel.description:
How exactly do you create a server based off the current client you're using? I really don't get it. I want to give this a shot, but I need a little further knowledge before I can proceed. Does it have to do with packets? I want to help this community to my best ability.
Can someone supply me with more information please? It would be very helpful. Thanks in advance.

item.title: Question to anyone with knowledge to clients && servers
item.dc:creator: @quest_rs quest rs
item.description:
@quest_rs wrote:

you have to rework the login handling packets, setting the client, getting the frames etc.

Can’t really provide you with much help

Read full topic
item.source: Question to anyone with knowledge to clients && servers

item.description:
@Olbrantz wrote:

There’s already 317 servers… I’m trying to BENEFIT the community. Like 450+ clients, what info would allow me to start making my own server?

Seriously come on anyone…?
